speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Jacob. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: Hi Jacob, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I hope you're doing well today.

speaker: Customer
text: I'm alright, thank you. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your past due balance with ABC Credit. Can you confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jacob. You have a balance of $450. Would you like to discuss payment options today?

speaker: Customer
text: I need to check my finances first before I can commit to anything.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. We can definitely give you some time. When do you think you'll be able to follow up?

speaker: Customer
text: Maybe in a week or so. I just need to figure things out.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I'll mark that down for a follow-up. Just remember, it's important to address this balance as soon as you can.

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, thank you for your call.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Jacob. Talk to you soon!
